author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds two command line options to `edmStorageTrace.py`
* `--readRanges` prints the read offset ranges of each singular read / vector read element
  * These are just `(offset, offset+size)` pairs, but are easier to interpret than having to calculate the end every time
  * The printout also contains only these ranges (information on read operation id is included in lines starting with `#`) so the data is straightforward to manipulate with further command line tools
* `--mapReadRanges` translates the aforementioned read offset ranges to TFile content with the help of an auxiliary text file that should contain the output of `edmFileUtil --map`

These were useful to understand CMSSW behavior in the context of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47750

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1411

#### PR validation:

Added options work in private test
title: Extend edmStorageTrace.py to print read offset ranges and map those to the TFile contents
